content.text: 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut diagonally in 1 inch slices
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut diagonally in 1 inch slices" )

content.text: 1) Arrange the slices of bread in the bottom.
2) In a large bowl, beat together eggs, milk, cream, vanilla and cinnamon.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "beat"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "eggs"@34:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "milk"@40:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cream"@46:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "vanilla"@53:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cinnamon"@65:73 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Pour over bread slices, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
4) The next morning, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "preheat"@21:28 / AC
		:when ( "The next morning"@3:19 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( tool-4-0 "oven"@29:33 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "350 degrees F"@37:50 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "175 degrees C"@52:65 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) In a small saucepan, combine butter, brown sugar and corn syrup; heat until bubbling.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "combine"@24:31 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "butter"@32:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "brown sugar"@40:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "corn syrup"@56:66 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a small saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "heat"@68:72 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until bubbling"@73:87 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Pour over bread and egg mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:gol ( "bread"@13:18 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "egg mixture"@23:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Bake in preheated oven, uncovered, for 40 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "40 minutes"@42:52 / DUR )
	)
)
